narration.welcome: Welcome to the Neural Savanna, where we learn AI through the wisdom of Africa.
narration.lesson1: In the Ubuntu way, we begin our journey together. Today we learn about neural networks through the wisdom of the acacia tree.
narration.lesson2: Like the roots of the baobab tree, neural networks connect and share knowledge. We grow stronger together.
narration.lesson3: The lion hunts with patience and strategy. So too must we approach machine learning with wisdom and care.
narration.lesson4: Water flows like data through our networks. Each drop contributes to the greater flow of knowledge.
narration.lesson5: The elephant never forgets, and neither do our neural networks. Memory is the foundation of learning.
